title: Mini Ranchero Enchiladas with Ranchitas Natural
instructions: Step 1. Season the ground beef and cook in a skillet.
Step 2. Season the shredded chicken with salt and pepper.
Step 3. Place a portion of cabbage on each chip, followed by beef or chicken, cheese, and tomato.
Step 4. Season the meat, cook it, season the shredded chicken, and place a portion on each chip with cheese and tomato.
